question: Which is the protein-membrane interface of the Cholesterol-regulated Start protein 4 protein (STARD4)?
ideal_answer: L124 is the protein-membrane interface of the Cholesterol-regulated Start protein 4 protein (STARD4).

snippets.text: Our results show that STARD4 interacts with anionic membranes through a surface-exposed basic patch and that introducing a mutation (L124D) into the Omega-1 (Ω1) loop, which covers the sterol binding pocket, attenuates sterol transfer activity.
